actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, January 5, 2024,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, January 5, 2024, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN1020:
        John A. Kazen, of Texas, to be United States District Judge for the Southern District of Texas

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Cloture invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 73 - 15. Record Vote Number: 1
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Schumer, at  6:34 p.m., the Senate adjourned, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
